title: सोशल डिस्टेंसिंग पर नुक्कड़ नाटक का एक हिस्सा दिखाकर मुस्लिम समाज पर निशाना साधा

vclaim: On the behalf of Shiksha samadhan trust I am uploading all the proper videos that we performed with Katrash Thana on 4-05-2020. Plz don’t be misleaded by haters. We are mainly spreading awareness for covid-19.@HemantSorenJMM@JharkhandCMOpic.twitter.com/26gCWBQzmT
